mapper.insert: insert into member (member_email, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_address, member_introduce, member_profile_url, member_level) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberIntroduce}, #{memberProfileUrl}, #{memberLevel})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_email = #{memberEmail}

select member_id, member_email, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_address, member_introduce, member_profile_url, member_level from member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_password = #{memberPassword}
